<td style="padding-top:20px">
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">Good morning. </strong>Google tells us that searches for “dating” have hit a 5-year-high, which raises the question: What are people hoping to learn when Googling the word "dating"?</p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">You’re not going to find your soulmate from reading the "dating" Wikipedia entry. But you <em>will</em> stumble upon this piece of helpful advice: “Ballroom dancing is one way to get to know somebody on a date.” It’s not wrong.</p>

<div class="c6 " style="margin-bottom:7px">
<!-- <![endif]-->
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<th class="card" style="text-align:left;font-weight:400;font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#333;display:block;background-color:#fff;border-radius:15px;border:1px solid #e6e6e6;border-collapse:collapse;box-shadow:none;margin-bottom:0px">
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<td style="padding: 15px;">
<h3 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#1c7ff2;font-weight:700;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:0">
COVID
</h3>
<h1 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:24px;color:#333;font-weight:700;margin-bottom:0;line-height:26px;margin-top:8px">
<a href="https://www.morningbrew.com/daily/stories/2021/07/21/france-starts-mandating-vaccination-entry-cultural-venues?email={{profile.email}}" target="_blank" style="color:#000000!important;text-decoration:none;border-bottom:none!important;">
<font color="#000000">
France Takes a Stance
</font></a>
</h1>
</td>
</tr>
</table>
<a href="https://www.morningbrew.com/daily/stories/2021/07/21/france-starts-mandating-vaccination-entry-cultural-venues?utm_source=morning_brew" style="text-decoration:none;border:none;" target="_blank" class="">
<img alt="A framed picture of a vaccination record card " style="display: block; width: 100%; max-width: 670px;" width="670" class="story-header-image" src="https://dlp31coh2a67q.cloudfront.net/eyJrZXkiOiJ1cGxvYWRzL21lZGl1bS9hc3NldC81ODYxL25vX3ZhY2NpbmVfbm9fZW50cnkuanBnIiwiYnVja2V0Ijoib3Nsby1wcm9kdWN0aW9uIiwiZWRpdHMiOnsicmVzaXplIjp7IndpZHRoIjoxMDAwLCJoZWlnaHQiOm51bGx9fX0=">
</a>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;padding-left:10px;margin-top:5px;margin-bottom:0px;line-height:14px;">
<small><em></em></small>
</p>
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<td style="padding:15px">
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">Starting yesterday, not being vaccinated for Covid-19 in France is like not drinking your morning coffee: Life will simply be worse without it. </p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">Large entertainment and cultural venues, including museums, sports arenas, and movie theaters, will now <a href="https://www.theguardian.com/world/2021/jul/21/i-never-thought-this-would-happen-in-france-day-one-of-showing-the-covid-vaccine-pass?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">require proof</a> of vaccination or a negative test for Covid-19. And that’s just the start—being vaccinated will be a requirement to enter other businesses, such as cafes and restaurants, starting in August. </p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">Why now? </strong>President Emmanuel Macron announced the measures last week in order to revive a slowing vaccination drive and limit the worst impacts of the Delta variant. France’s infection rate has jumped 125% in the last week and a little over 40% of the population is fully vaccinated.</p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">The vaccine strategy has resulted in two things:</p>
<ol>
<li aria-level="1" style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px">
<span>
</span><span><strong style="color:#000">It has angered a lot of people: </strong></span><span>More than 100,000 protestors </span><span><a href="https://apnews.com/article/europe-business-health-government-and-politics-france-d25494f4cf4ca6c6d1464188a89ece6f?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">hit the streets</a></span><span> last weekend, saying the vaccine rules infringed on their rights. </span>
</li>
<li aria-level="1" style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px">
<span>
</span><span><strong style="color:#000">It has spurred vaccinations:</strong></span><span> The country set a single-day record for shots administered last Friday (880,000). In the 24 hours after Macron’s speech more than </span><span><a href="https://www.nytimes.com/live/2021/07/19/world/covid-variant-vaccine-updates?utm_source=morning_brew#indiana-university-vaccine-mandate-ruling" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">1.7 million people</a></span><span> scheduled a vaccine appointment.</span>
</li>
</ol>
<h2 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:19px;font-weight:700;color:#000;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;margin-right:0;margin-left:0">What about us? </h2>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">The US federal government hasn’t introduced any vaccine requirements for businesses, and it likely won’t take any steps until the FDA grants <a href="https://www.nbcnews.com/politics/white-house/vaccine-mandates-more-likely-once-fda-grants-full-approvals-health-n1274288?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">full approval</a> to at least one of the shots.</p>
<ul style="margin-top:0;padding-left:30px">
<li aria-level="1" style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px"><span>Remember, right now all three US-made vaccines (Pfizer, Moderna, and J&J) are under “emergency use authorization.” Pfizer expects full approval by January 2022 latest. </span></li>
</ul>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">That hasn’t stopped other organizations from saying, “no vaccine, no service.” <a href="https://www.chronicle.com/blogs/live-coronavirus-updates/heres-a-list-of-colleges-that-will-require-students-to-be-vaccinated-against-covid-19?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">590 colleges</a> have at least some form of vaccine mandate. <a href="https://www.nytimes.com/2021/07/21/health/covid-vaccine-hospitals.html?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">More hospitals</a> are now requiring that their staff get vaccinated. And plenty of businesses, from your local bar to Madison Square Garden, will want you to show proof of vaccination before stepping inside.</p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">Bottom line: </strong>From $1 million lotteries to calling in Olivia Rodrigo for a PSA, US officials have offered loads of carrots to push the vaccine-hesitant to get their shots. France is breaking out the sticks. </p>

<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<th class="card" style="text-align:left;font-weight:400;font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#333;display:block;background-color:#fff;border-radius:15px;border:1px solid #e6e6e6;border-collapse:collapse;box-shadow:none;margin-bottom:0px">
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<td style="padding: 15px;">
<h3 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#1c7ff2;font-weight:700;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:0">
PHARMA
</h3>
<h1 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:24px;color:#333;font-weight:700;margin-bottom:0;line-height:26px;margin-top:8px">
<a href="https://www.morningbrew.com/daily/stories/2021/07/21/first-look-new-26-billion-opioid-settlement?email={{profile.email}}" target="_blank" style="color:#000000!important;text-decoration:none;border-bottom:none!important;">
<font color="#000000">
A First Look at the $26 Billion Opioid Settlement
</font></a>
</h1>
</td>
</tr>
</table>
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<td style="padding-right:15px;padding-bottom:15px;padding-left:15px;padding-top:0px">
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">After years of back-and-forth, a group of state attorneys general <a href="https://www.cnbc.com/2021/07/21/drug-distributors-jj-reach-landmark-26-billion-opioid-settlement-.html?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">released</a> a tentative $26 billion settlement that would be the largest penalty for four big players in the opioid epidemic that’s killed hundreds of thousands of Americans.</p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">The details</strong>: </p>
<ul style="margin-top:0;padding-left:30px">
<li aria-level="1" style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px"><span>The plan would require drug distributors McKesson, Cardinal Health, and AmerisourceBergen to pay $21 billion over 18 years. These companies were accused of lax oversight that bolstered the black market supply of painkillers. </span></li>
<li aria-level="1" style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px"><span>Johnson & Johnson, a drug manufacturer accused of downplaying the addictiveness of opioids in its marketing, would shell out $5 billion over nine years.</span></li>
</ul>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">Big picture: </strong>3,000+ separate lawsuits from across the US were consolidated into this mega-case, which as soon as next year could direct billions of dollars to address the epidemic. But some don’t think it’s enough. Washington state’s attorney general, Bob Ferguson, told CNBC, “The settlement is, to be blunt, not nearly good enough for Washington.”</p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">Looking ahead...</strong>the crisis is only getting worse. Drug overdose deaths <a href="https://www.morningbrew.com/daily/stories/2021/07/14/drug-overdose-deaths-rose-nearly-30-last-year?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">rose nearly 30%</a> in the US last year, to a record of 93,331.</p>

<tr>
<td style="padding-top: 12px;">
<a href="https://www.facebook.com/sharer/sharer.php?u=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.morningbrew.com%2Fdaily%2Fstories%2F2021%2F07%2F21%2Ffirst-look-new-26-billion-opioid-settlement" target="_blank" rel="noopener" style="text-decoration: none;" class="">

</a><span>  </span>

<tr>
<th class="card" style="text-align:left;font-weight:400;font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#333;display:block;background-color:#fff;border-radius:15px;border:1px solid #e6e6e6;border-collapse:collapse;box-shadow:none;margin-bottom:0px">
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<td style="padding: 15px;">
<h3 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#1c7ff2;font-weight:700;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:0">
SPORTS
</h3>
<h1 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:24px;color:#333;font-weight:700;margin-bottom:0;line-height:26px;margin-top:8px">
<a href="https://www.morningbrew.com/daily/stories/2021/07/21/olympics-opening-ceremony-friday-brew-readers-feeling?email={{profile.email}}" target="_blank" style="color:#000000!important;text-decoration:none;border-bottom:none!important;">
<font color="#000000">
Olympics Have ‘Too Late to Cancel This Wedding’ Vibes
</font></a>
</h1>
</td>
</tr>
</table>
<a href="https://www.morningbrew.com/daily/stories/2021/07/21/olympics-opening-ceremony-friday-brew-readers-feeling?utm_source=morning_brew" style="text-decoration:none;border:none;" target="_blank" class="">
<img alt="Two people standing behind human sized Olympic rings" style="display: block; width: 100%; max-width: 670px;" width="670" class="story-header-image" src="https://dlp31coh2a67q.cloudfront.net/eyJrZXkiOiJ1cGxvYWRzL21lZGl1bS9hc3NldC80MDUyL29seW1waWNfcmluZ3MuanBnIiwiYnVja2V0Ijoib3Nsby1wcm9kdWN0aW9uIiwiZWRpdHMiOnsicmVzaXplIjp7IndpZHRoIjoxMDAwLCJoZWlnaHQiOm51bGx9fX0=">
</a>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;padding-left:10px;margin-top:5px;margin-bottom:0px;line-height:14px;">
<small><em>Carl Court/Getty Images</em></small>
</p>
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<td style="padding:15px">
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">The <a href="https://sports.nbcsports.com/2021/07/21/when-do-the-tokyo-olympics-start-opening-ceremony-schedule-date-time-tv/?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">opening ceremony</a> for the Olympics will be held tomorrow morning, but if managers are worried about a productivity hit in the AM, they shouldn’t be. </p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">In a poll of 6,000 Morning Brew readers, 42% said they’re less likely to watch the Tokyo Olympics than previous years’ Olympics. 52% said their plans haven’t really changed, and just 6% said they’d watch more. </p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">Here are the other juiciest bits of our Olympics survey. </p>
<ul style="margin-top:0;padding-left:30px">
<li aria-level="1" style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px">
<span>
</span><span><strong style="color:#000">Covid: </strong></span><span>Should the Olympics have been canceled this year due to Covid-19 concerns? 50% of readers said yes. And 51% said they’re worried that the Olympics will be a superspreader event.</span>
</li>
<li aria-level="1" style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px">
<span>
</span><span><strong style="color:#000">Viewership: </strong></span><span>How much of the Olympics do readers plan to watch? 57% said “a few hours here and there,” while 17% said they wouldn’t watch at all and 16% said they plan on watching a “considerable amount.”</span>
</li>
<li aria-level="1" style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px">
<span>
</span><span><strong style="color:#000">Peacock: </strong></span><span>NBC is hoping to use the Olympics to snag new subscribers for its streaming service, Peacock. That’s going to work with 3% of respondents, who said they’re going to buy Peacock to watch the Olympics. 83% said they wouldn’t buy Peacock, and 14% already have it.</span>
</li>
</ul>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">Bottom line: </strong>Brew readers are feeling the same anxiety as Olympic organizers. New Covid cases in Tokyo hit their <a href="https://www.npr.org/sections/tokyo-olympics-live-updates/2021/07/21/1018903479/tokyo-reports-its-highest-covid-19-numbers-since-january-as-first-olympic-games-?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">highest levels</a> since January yesterday.</p>

<th class="card" style="text-align:left;font-weight:400;font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#333;display:block;background-color:#fff;border-radius:15px;border:1px solid #e6e6e6;border-collapse:collapse;box-shadow:none;margin-bottom:0px">
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<td style="padding: 15px;">
<h3 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#1c7ff2;font-weight:700;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:0">
GRAB BAG
</h3>
<h1 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:24px;color:#333;font-weight:700;margin-bottom:0;line-height:26px;margin-top:8px">
<a href="https://www.morningbrew.com/daily/stories/2021/07/21/key-performance-indicators-july-22?email={{profile.email}}" target="_blank" style="color:#000000!important;text-decoration:none;border-bottom:none!important;">
<font color="#000000">
Key Performance Indicators
</font></a>
</h1>
</td>
</tr>
</table>
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<td style="padding-right:15px;padding-bottom:15px;padding-left:15px;padding-top:0px">
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">Stat: </strong>US life expectancy <a href="https://www.nytimes.com/2021/07/21/us/american-life-expectancy-report.html?action=click&module=Spotlight&pgtype=Homepage" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">fell by 1.5 years</a> in 2020, the steepest drop since World War II, thanks in large part to the coronavirus. Hispanic (3 years) and Black Americans (2.9) recorded the worst drops, while white Americans’ life expectancy fell by 1.2 years. Life expectancy in the US hasn’t been this low since 2003.</p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">Quote: </strong>“My hope is that it creates world peace or helps create world peace.”</p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">Clad in tie-dye, Twitter CEO Jack Dorsey went full <em>Miss Congeniality</em> during a webinar on bitcoin yesterday. Speaking on an <a href="https://www.cnbc.com/2021/07/21/jack-dorsey-hopes-bitcoin-will-help-bring-about-world-peace.html?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">all-star panel</a> with Tesla CEO Elon Musk and ARK Invest CEO Cathie Wood, Dorsey explained that if bitcoin could solve underlying monetary issues, everyone could focus on fixing other things. And it’s a straight shot from there to world peace, apparently.</p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">Read: </strong>Does CrossFit have a future? (<a href="https://www.newyorker.com/sports/sporting-scene/does-crossfit-have-a-future?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">New Yorker</a>) </p>

<tr>
<th class="card" style="text-align:left;font-weight:400;font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#333;display:block;background-color:#fff;border-radius:15px;border:1px solid #e6e6e6;border-collapse:collapse;box-shadow:none;margin-bottom:0px">

<td style="padding: 15px;">
<h3 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#1c7ff2;font-weight:700;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:0">
CRYPTO
</h3>
<h1 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:24px;color:#333;font-weight:700;margin-bottom:0;line-height:26px;margin-top:8px">
<a href="https://www.morningbrew.com/daily/stories/2021/07/21/zed-run-developer-raises-20-million?email={{profile.email}}" target="_blank" style="color:#000000!important;text-decoration:none;border-bottom:none!important;">
<font color="#000000">
This NFT Startup Is Off to the Races
</font></a>
</h1>
</td>

</table>
<a href="https://www.morningbrew.com/daily/stories/2021/07/21/zed-run-developer-raises-20-million?utm_source=morning_brew" style="text-decoration:none;border:none;" target="_blank" class="">
<img alt="Two virtual horses on VHS's Series A announcement" style="display: block; width: 100%; max-width: 670px;" width="670" class="story-header-image" src="https://dlp31coh2a67q.cloudfront.net/eyJrZXkiOiJ1cGxvYWRzL21lZGl1bS9hc3NldC81ODYzL3Zoc196ZWRfcnVuX3Nlcmllc19hLnBuZyIsImJ1Y2tldCI6Im9zbG8tcHJvZHVjdGlvbiIsImVkaXRzIjp7InJlc2l6ZSI6eyJ3aWR0aCI6MTAwMCwiaGVpZ2h0IjpudWxsfX19">
</a>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;padding-left:10px;margin-top:5px;margin-bottom:0px;line-height:14px;">
<small><em>Twitter</em></small>
</p>
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<td style="padding:15px">
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">Virtually Human Studio, a startup known for developing *squints at notes* virtual horse NFT platform Zed Run, raised $20 million in Series A funding yesterday from the likes of TCG Capital Management and Andreessen Horowitz.</p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">On Zed Run’s platform, 14,000+ “stable owners” (also affectionately called #ZEDheads) buy, sell, breed, and race virtual horses. Because NFTs are blockchain-verifiable <a href="https://www.morningbrew.com/daily/stories/2021/02/24/nft-frequently-asked-questions?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">digital assets</a>, each of these virtual horses is “unique.” </p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">To some folks, that makes them <a href="https://www.wsj.com/articles/tcg-and-andreessen-horowitz-invest-in-startup-behind-virtual-horse-racing-platform-11626865200?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">extremely valuable</a>: </p>
<ul style="margin-top:0;padding-left:30px">
<li aria-level="1" style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px"><span>Horses can cost as much as $45,000 each.</span></li>
<li aria-level="1" style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px"><span>Whole stables of digital Hidalgos have sold for more than $250,000.</span></li>
<li aria-level="1" style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px"><span>$30+ million worth of Zed horses have been sold so far.  </span></li>
</ul>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">How does Zed Run make money? It takes a cut every time users breed, race, or sell their horses. Meanwhile, users can win ethereum by getting on the digital race podium or by selling their horses to others at a profit.</p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">Zoom out:</strong> Even if media chatter around NFTs has died down, there’s still a crowd willing to pony up for the cryptographic tokens, and investors are expecting that crowd to grow.</p>

<td style="padding-right:15px;padding-bottom:15px;padding-left:15px;padding-top:0px">
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">Brew Mini: </strong>Mini in size, but major in heart. <a href="https://www.morningbrew.com/daily/stories/2021/07/21/brew-mini-ice-cream?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">Play it here</a>.</p>
<h2 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:19px;font-weight:700;color:#000;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;margin-right:0;margin-left:0"><strong style="color:#000">Three Headlines and a Lie</strong></h2>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">If you can correctly identify which of these four headlines is made up, you’ll win a ticket aboard the official Morning Brew rocket. We haven’t decided if we’ll go to Richard Branson space or real space though.<strong style="color:#000"></strong></p>

style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;padding-left:10px;margin-top:5px;margin-bottom:0px;line-height:14px;\"\u003e\n\u003csmall\u003e\u003cem\u003e\u003c/em\u003e\u003c/small\u003e\n\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003ctable width=\"100%\" cellpadding=\"0\" cellspacing=\"0\" border=\"0\" style=\"border-collapse: collapse;\"\u003e\n\u003ctr\u003e\n\u003ctd style=\"padding:15px\"\u003e\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eStarting yesterday, not being vaccinated for Covid-19 in France is like not drinking your morning coffee: Life will simply be worse without it. \u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eLarge entertainment and cultural venues, including museums, sports arenas, and movie theaters, will now \u003ca href=\"https://www.theguardian.com/world/2021/jul/21/i-never-thought-this-would-happen-in-france-day-one-of-showing-the-covid-vaccine-pass?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003erequire proof\u003c/a\u003e of vaccination or a negative test for Covid-19. And that’s just the start—being vaccinated will be a requirement to enter other businesses, such as cafes and restaurants, starting in August. \u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003e\u003cstrong style=\"color:#000\"\u003eWhy now? \u003c/strong\u003ePresident Emmanuel Macron announced the measures last week in order to revive a slowing vaccination drive and limit the worst impacts of the Delta variant. France’s infection rate has jumped 125% in the last week and a little over 40% of the population is fully vaccinated.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eThe vaccine strategy has resulted in two things:\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003col\u003e\r\n\u003cli aria-level=\"1\" style=\"line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px\"\u003e\n\u003cspan\u003e\n\u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan\u003e\u003cstrong style=\"color:#000\"\u003eIt has angered a lot of people: \u003c/strong\u003e\u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan\u003eMore than 100,000 protestors \u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan\u003e\u003ca href=\"https://apnews.com/article/europe-business-health-government-and-politics-france-d25494f4cf4ca6c6d1464188a89ece6f?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003ehit the streets\u003c/a\u003e\u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan\u003e last weekend, saying the vaccine rules infringed on their rights. \u003c/span\u003e\n\u003c/li\u003e\r\n\u003cli aria-level=\"1\" style=\"line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px\"\u003e\n\u003cspan\u003e\n\u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan\u003e\u003cstrong style=\"color:#000\"\u003eIt has spurred vaccinations:\u003c/strong\u003e\u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan\u003e The country set a single-day record for shots administered last Friday (880,000). In the 24 hours after Macron’s speech more than \u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan\u003e\u003ca href=\"https://www.nytimes.com/live/2021/07/19/world/covid-variant-vaccine-updates?utm_source=morning_brew#indiana-university-vaccine-mandate-ruling\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003e1.7 million people\u003c/a\u003e\u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan\u003e scheduled a vaccine appointment.\u003c/span\u003e\n\u003c/li\u003e\r\n\u003c/ol\u003e\r\n\u003ch2 style=\"font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:19px;font-weight:700;color:#000;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;margin-right:0;margin-left:0\"\u003eWhat about us? \u003c/h2\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eThe US federal government hasn’t introduced any vaccine requirements for businesses, and it likely won’t take any steps until the FDA grants \u003ca href=\"https://www.nbcnews.com/politics/white-house/vaccine-mandates-more-likely-once-fda-grants-full-approvals-health-n1274288?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003efull approval\u003c/a\u003e to at least one of the shots.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cul style=\"margin-top:0;padding-left:30px\"\u003e\r\n\u003cli aria-level=\"1\" style=\"line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px\"\u003e\u003cspan\u003eRemember, right now all three US-made vaccines (Pfizer, Moderna, and J\u0026J) are under “emergency use authorization.” Pfizer expects full approval by January 2022 latest. \u003c/span\u003e\u003c/li\u003e\r\n\u003c/ul\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eThat hasn’t stopped other organizations from saying, “no vaccine, no service.” \u003ca href=\"https://www.chronicle.com/blogs/live-coronavirus-updates/heres-a-list-of-colleges-that-will-require-students-to-be-vaccinated-against-covid-19?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003e590 colleges\u003c/a\u003e have at least some form of vaccine mandate. \u003ca href=\"https://www.nytimes.com/2021/07/21/health/covid-vaccine-hospitals.html?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003eMore hospitals\u003c/a\u003e are now requiring that their staff get vaccinated. And plenty of businesses, from your local bar to Madison Square Garden, will want you to show proof of vaccination before stepping inside.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003e\u003cstrong style=\"color:#000\"\u003eBottom line: \u003c/strong\u003eFrom $1 million lotteries to calling in Olivia Rodrigo for a PSA, US officials have offered loads of carrots to push the vaccine-hesitant to get their shots. style=\"color:#000000!important;text-decoration:none;border-bottom:none!important;\"\u003e\n\u003cfont color=\"#000000\"\u003e\nA First Look at the $26 Billion Opioid Settlement\n\u003c/font\u003e\u003c/a\u003e\n\u003c/h1\u003e\n\u003c/td\u003e\n\u003c/tr\u003e\n\u003c/table\u003e\n\u003ctable width=\"100%\" cellpadding=\"0\" cellspacing=\"0\" border=\"0\" style=\"border-collapse: collapse;\"\u003e\n\u003ctr\u003e\n\u003ctd style=\"padding-right:15px;padding-bottom:15px;padding-left:15px;padding-top:0px\"\u003e\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eAfter years of back-and-forth, a group of state attorneys general \u003ca href=\"https://www.cnbc.com/2021/07/21/drug-distributors-jj-reach-landmark-26-billion-opioid-settlement-.html?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003ereleased\u003c/a\u003e a tentative $26 billion settlement that would be the largest penalty for four big players in the opioid epidemic that’s killed hundreds of thousands of Americans.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003e\u003cstrong style=\"color:#000\"\u003eThe details\u003c/strong\u003e: \u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cul style=\"margin-top:0;padding-left:30px\"\u003e\r\n\u003cli aria-level=\"1\" style=\"line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px\"\u003e\u003cspan\u003eThe plan would require drug distributors McKesson, Cardinal Health, and AmerisourceBergen to pay $21 billion over 18 years. These companies were accused of lax oversight that bolstered the black market supply of painkillers. \u003c/span\u003e\u003c/li\u003e\r\n\u003cli aria-level=\"1\" style=\"line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px\"\u003e\u003cspan\u003eJohnson \u0026 Johnson, a drug manufacturer accused of downplaying the addictiveness of opioids in its marketing, would shell out $5 billion over nine years.\u003c/span\u003e\u003c/li\u003e\r\n\u003c/ul\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003e\u003cstrong style=\"color:#000\"\u003eBig picture: \u003c/strong\u003e3,000+ separate lawsuits from across the US were consolidated into this mega-case, which as soon as next year could direct billions of dollars to address the epidemic. But some don’t think it’s enough. Washington state’s attorney general, Bob Ferguson, told CNBC, “The settlement is, to be blunt, not nearly good enough for Washington.”\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003e\u003cstrong style=\"color:#000\"\u003eLooking ahead...\u003c/strong\u003ethe crisis is only getting worse. Drug overdose deaths \u003ca href=\"https://www.morningbrew.com/daily/stories/2021/07/14/drug-overdose-deaths-rose-nearly-30-last-year?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003erose nearly 30%\u003c/a\u003e in the US last year, to a record of 93,331.\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003c!-- href=\"https://sports.nbcsports.com/2021/07/21/when-do-the-tokyo-olympics-start-opening-ceremony-schedule-date-time-tv/?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003eopening ceremony\u003c/a\u003e for the Olympics will be held tomorrow morning, but if managers are worried about a productivity hit in the AM, they shouldn’t be. \u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eIn a poll of 6,000 Morning Brew readers, 42% said they’re less likely to watch the Tokyo Olympics than previous years’ Olympics. 52% said their plans haven’t really changed, and just 6% said they’d watch more. \u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eHere are the other juiciest bits of our Olympics survey. \u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cul style=\"margin-top:0;padding-left:30px\"\u003e\r\n\u003cli aria-level=\"1\" style=\"line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px\"\u003e\n\u003cspan\u003e\n\u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan\u003e\u003cstrong style=\"color:#000\"\u003eCovid: \u003c/strong\u003e\u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan\u003eShould the Olympics have been canceled this year due to Covid-19 concerns? 50% of readers said yes. And 51% said they’re worried that the Olympics will be a superspreader event.\u003c/span\u003e\n\u003c/li\u003e\r\n\u003cli aria-level=\"1\" style=\"line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px\"\u003e\n\u003cspan\u003e\n\u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan\u003e\u003cstrong style=\"color:#000\"\u003eViewership: \u003c/strong\u003e\u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan\u003eHow much of the Olympics do readers plan to watch? 57% said “a few hours here and there,” while 17% said they wouldn’t watch at all and 16% said they plan on watching a “considerable amount.”\u003c/span\u003e\n\u003c/li\u003e\r\n\u003cli aria-level=\"1\" style=\"line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px\"\u003e\n\u003cspan\u003e\n\u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan\u003e\u003cstrong style=\"color:#000\"\u003ePeacock: \u003c/strong\u003e\u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan\u003eNBC is hoping to use the Olympics to snag new subscribers for its streaming service, Peacock. That’s going to work with 3% of respondents, who said they’re going to buy Peacock to watch the Olympics. 83% said they wouldn’t buy Peacock, and 14% already have it.\u003c/span\u003e\n\u003c/li\u003e\r\n\u003c/ul\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003e\u003cstrong style=\"color:#000\"\u003eBottom line: \u003c/strong\u003eBrew readers are feeling the same anxiety as Olympic organizers. style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eVirtually Human Studio, a startup known for developing *squints at notes* virtual horse NFT platform Zed Run, raised $20 million in platform, 14,000+ “stable owners” (also affectionately called #ZEDheads) buy, sell, breed, and race virtual horses. Because NFTs are blockchain-verifiable \u003ca href=\"https://www.morningbrew.com/daily/stories/2021/02/24/nft-frequently-asked-questions?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003edigital assets\u003c/a\u003e, each of these virtual horses is “unique.” \u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eTo some folks, that makes them \u003ca href=\"https://www.wsj.com/articles/tcg-and-andreessen-horowitz-invest-in-startup-behind-virtual-horse-racing-platform-11626865200?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003eextremely valuable\u003c/a\u003e: \u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cul style=\"margin-top:0;padding-left:30px\"\u003e\r\n\u003cli aria-level=\"1\" style=\"line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px\"\u003e\u003cspan\u003eHorses can cost as much as $45,000 each.\u003c/span\u003e\u003c/li\u003e\r\n\u003cli aria-level=\"1\" style=\"line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px\"\u003e\u003cspan\u003eWhole stables of digital Hidalgos have sold for more than $250,000.\u003c/span\u003e\u003c/li\u003e\r\n\u003cli aria-level=\"1\" style=\"line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px\"\u003e\u003cspan\u003e$30+ million worth of Zed horses have been sold so far.  \u003c/span\u003e\u003c/li\u003e\r\n\u003c/ul\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eHow does Zed Run make money? It takes a cut every time users breed, race, or sell their horses. Meanwhile, users can win ethereum by getting on the digital race podium or by selling their horses to others at a profit.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cp
